segments.text: The kitchen feels like a world apart from the serene garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m struck by how calm the view through the window is, even as chaos reigns inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman, oblivious, as the water cascades over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if she’s in a trance, trapped in a moment that could lead to disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's antics only add to the tension; he looks like he could topple at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he's risking it all just for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is so hopeful, yet I want to shout for them to stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene captures that moment of innocent mischief right before the storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me feels guilty for not warning them, even if it seems silly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sweetness of the cookies almost masks the danger in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR
